hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PROXY_SERVER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Proxy Server (Ex: proxy.internal.com). Leave empty to disable proxy

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PROXY_USER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Authenticated Proxy Username (if not authenticated, leave blank)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PROXY_PASS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Authenticated Proxy Password (if not authenticated, leave blank)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NO_PROXY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Comma delimited list of DNS names where proxy server should not be used

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cp /usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh /usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh.BAK sed -i -e "s/^proxyServer=.*$/proxyServer=\"$PROXY_SERVER\"/" /usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh sed -i -e "s/^proxyPort=.*$/proxyPort=\"$PROXY_PORT\"/" /usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh sed -i -e "s/^proxyProto=.*$/proxyProto=\"$PROXY_PROTO\"/" /usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh sed -i -e "s/^proxyUser=.*$/proxyUser=\"$PROXY_USER\"/" /usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh sed -i -e "s/^proxyPass=.*$/proxyPass=\"$PROXY_PASS\"/" /usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh sed -i -e "s/^noProxy=.*$/noProxy=\"$NO_PROXY\"/" /usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh
